titleStmt.title: B. C. Bennett et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2342

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: To, T, E, Bramblett Gov, of Kentucky,

We the undersigned citizens of the South Carrollton Election precinct Muhlenberg, County Ky -- do think it inexpedient to appoint a justice of the peace in the place of Charles Morehead -- Decd and request your excellency to order and Election on the 1st Monday in Augt, 64 to fill said vacancy -- believeing that this course would be more satisfactory to the people -- which is respectfully submitted for your consideration,

B. C. Bennett
Benjamin Drake
John Kittinger
D Dillman
M Roll
Jesse Moore
Elias D Moore
John D Fulkerson
L, D, Fentiss
T L Young
Alex, Clark
Joel Y Clark
Thos Bruce
C, B, Wickliffe
T A Pittman C M C
Dr Bnj Davy
Wm Wright
J N Robertson
Joseph Mehgan
Gorg C Dillman
We think hit wold not be best to apoint one untill the regular Election

Daniel G. Gish
John Pollock
A. Vaughn
Mark Coxen
James Robertson
George Johnston --
E W Coombs
E. K. Finch
H J Gatton
C W Mills
Wm B Wickliffe
F A Salsburg
J. W. Humphrey
A. A. Lovelace
B Nofsinger
H Steward
R N Sraud
W Doss
D Gish
J T Moseley
Johnathan Gosett
J L Coffman Jr
E. L. Wiggins
J H Nafsinger
J S Nafsinger
J. T. Shrewsbury
John B Hughes
James P Doss
John W Taylor
Jonathan Yonts
A T Howerton
J H Dantz
G K Noll
Levi Bidwell jr
C S Morehead
Jabez Durham
Haywood Bruce
James Henry
B S. Humbett
J. R. Nicholls
C, F Moore
N Howard
A F Kittinger
J F Jones
Aaron Wickliffe
Wm Young

Muhlenburg Co
apptd made before Receipt of remonstrance
